alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Gulf, southeastern Bay and southwestern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 430 PM EDT/330 PM CDT/... At 359 PM EDT/259 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Panama City to near Callaway to Tyndall Air Force Base. Movement was east at 45 mph. At 231 PM CDT, KPAM reported a wind gust of 52 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Wewahitchka, Honeyville, Allanton, Cedar Grove, Chipola Cutoff, Dirego Park, Beacon Beach, College Station, Brannonville, Chipola Park and Millville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT/600 PM CDT/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf
